data.actual_result: The dropdown menu is fully visible and can be interacted with it
data.expected_result: The dropdown menu is closed and cannot be interacted with it
data.short_description: Dropdown menu of a server doesn't disappear when clicking "Leave Server"
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server - Click the server's name so it opens the dropdown menu - Click "Leave Server" - Notice how the dropdown menu is still visible and you can interact with it
